net.bubbaland.megaciv.game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.bubbaland.megaciv.game.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Primary class for game data. All data necessary to represent the game state is held within an instance of this class. This class also loads static data from the Civ_Constants.xml file, which contains constants such as the default starting civilizations, AST requirements, trade cards, etc.
    Author:
    Walter Kolczynski
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
